generic_name: ACONITUM NAP, ALFALFA, AVENA, CHAMOMILLA, GELSEMIUM, HUMULUS IUPULUS, IGNATIA, KALI ARS, KALI PHOS, MURIATICUM AC, NAT PHOS, PASSIFLORA, PHOSPHORUS, STAPHYSAGRIA, STRAMONIUM
warnings: Warnings Warnings: If symptoms persist or worsen, consult a healthcare professional. If pregnant or breastfeeding, ask a health professional before use. Keep this and all medication out of reach of children. In case of overdose, get medical help or contact Poison Control Center right away.
dosage_administration: Directions Directions: Initially, depress pump until primed. Hold close to mouth and spray directly into mouth. Adults and children 12+: 3 sprays, 3 times per day. Children 2-12: 2 sprays, 3 times per day. Use additionally as needed, up to 6 times per day.
indications: Uses* Uses*: Temporarily relieves minor anxiousness and nervousness. *Claims based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical evidence. Not FDA evaluated.
